scripts.build: npm run copy && parcel build src/index.html
scripts.copy: npm run generate && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:svgs
scripts.copy:images: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/images_olivia && cp -R src/images_olivia/* dist/images_olivia
scripts.copy:svgs: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/svgs && cp -R src/svgs/* dist/svgs
scripts.generate: rm -rf src/svgs/ && mkdir src/svgs/ && npx ts-node scripts/generateSvgs.ts
